mapper.select: SELECT REV_NO /* prGoodsRevAtchFile.getReviewAttachedFileList */ , FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_ROUTE_NM , ATCH_FILE_NM , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_REV_ATCH_FILE WHERE REV_NO = #{revNo} ORDER BY FILE_SEQ
